headline: Show HN: ListFollowers.com – list Twitter follow(er)s, search, sort, and export
description:
Hi, I made a tool to list a Twitter user's follows or followers, combine two such list with set operations, search and sort throught the results, and export the results to JSON or CSV for further analysis.

Here's a thread of ideas for how you can use it: https://twitter.com/mechanical_monk/status/15500557633175060...

Let me know what you think!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: ListFollowers.com - 列出Twitter的关注者，搜索、排序和导出
